Item.Title: The Jazz Age
Item.Description: Gatsby author F. Scott Fitzgeral witnessed a time when New York was transformed by incredible wealth and excess. Go back to when an insatiable demand for alcohol fueled illegal underground parties, sweaty jazz blared from the streets, and fortunes were made and lost overnight.

Item.Title: Fitzgerald's Visual Poetry
Item.Description: Visionary director Baz Luhrmann created his own cinematic method and one of the most unique uses of 3D ever seen on screen to bring the poetic words of Fitzgerald's novel to life.

Item.Title: Razzle Dazzle: The Fashion of the '20s
Item.Description: Tiffany, Prada, Brooks Brothers and Fogal were invaluable partners due to their credible connection to the text, the fashion of the times or the life of F. Scott Fitgerald, joined famed production designer Catherine Martin for an exclusive look at the astounding costumes and prestigious brands that brought the roarin '20s to life.

Item.Title: The Greatness of Gatsby
Item.Description: From the Genesis of an idea on the Trans-Siberian Railroad to intimate actor wrokships, follow director Baz Luhrmann's Journey to bring the great American novel to the silver screen.

Chapters.Title: Her Voice Was Full of Money

Item.Title: Disconcerting Ride
Item.Description: Gatsby reveals his past in one of the film's most VFX-Heavy scenes.

Item.Title: The Swinging Sounds of Gatsby
Item.Description: Legendary musician's Jay-Z, Bryan Ferry, Beyonce, Will.I.Am, Fergie, Lana Del Rey, Florence + The Machine, The XX, Andre 3000, Sia, Gotye and more came together to meld a sonic masterpiece from score, 1920s jazz and contemporary music, giving a fresh, cutting-edge energy to this classic story.

Item.Title: 1926 The Great Gatsby Trailer
Item.Description: From the lost Herbert Brenon silent film The Great Gatsby.

Item.Title: Pool Scene
Item.Description: Gatsby reveals his past to Nick in an epic VFX-created montage.

Item.Title: The Plaza
Item.Description: Re-creating The Plaza Hotel of the 1920s - from amazing research to the unusual method used to film the main cast.

Item.Title: Daisy and Gatsby Meet
Item.Description: Shot in three locations during biblical weather conditions, yet still one of the film's most beautiful, heart-wrenching moments.

Item.Title: "Within and without" with Tobey Maguire
Item.Description: Tobey Maguire brings his camera on set for some rare and intimate moments with fellow co-stars and director Baz Luhrmann.
